item.description:
Moved Location - Let's Meet at Hickory Hill Drive Entrance. The White trail is not cut or even walked on yet.

If your dog is confrontational (i.e.=nasty) with other dogs please bring a leash and leash him/her when we leave/enter the trail so the group doesn't offend/scare anyone or their pooches.


Nice trails with hills, great views ... We'll do a shorter loop but still plan on roughly a 1.5 - 2 hour hike.

Let's keep the trail clean and pick up any of our dogs poop along the way if they go right on the trail.
item.how_to_find_us: Park at end of Hickory Hill Drive and please walk to the trail entrance and wait under power lines. If your dog is confrontational (i.e.=nasty) with other dogs please bring a leash and leash him/her when we leave/enter the trail.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Musquash = Changed to Hickory Hill Drive entrance due to access
